title: Interpretation of a dream about potatoes in a dream and seeing eating, cooking and buying potatoes

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about potatoes in a dream, and see the opinion of Ibn Sirin and the interpreters in the dream about seeing potatoes in a dream, seeing eating potatoes in a dream, cooking potatoes in a dream, and buying potatoes in a dream for singles, married women and pregnant women. Interpretation of a dream about potatoes Potatoes are a beautiful and useful dish that everyone loves, young and old. Seeing potatoes in a dream means goodness, blessing and success, and it may indicate evil in many visions, and we will show you all the good and bad opinions of seeing potatoes in a dream. Seeing potatoes in a dream indicates a fortune teller and gets what he wants or what he is looking for. From his point of view, he frying potatoes, his dream indicates some problems and crises, perhaps even bad for the viewer, and God knows best. Read in: Interpretation of dreams by Ibn Sirin according to the Arabic alphabet Peeling potatoes in a dream means getting rid of problems and worries and overcoming them. And seeing the purchase of a large amount of potatoes indicates that the problems will continue for a long time. Seeing potatoes in a dream Seeing potatoes in a dream according to most interpreters means kindness and blessing. And the interpretation of a dream about cooking potatoes in a dream is praiseworthy and shows kindness. Dreaming of eating boiled potatoes means wealth We wish you good luck. Seeing a potato market in a dream for a man may indicate debts. Eating potatoes in a dream without cooking means rushing into making a decision. Eating spoiled or damaged potatoes is a sign of problems and concerns. Interpretation of a dream about potatoes for single women The interpretation of seeing potatoes in a dream for a single woman indicates some problems and concerns. Perhaps carrying potatoes to singles indicates failure and disappointment. Also, seeing an unmarried woman eating potatoes greedily in a dream indicates the psychological problems that an unmarried woman faces. The interpretation of a dream about cooking potatoes for a single woman or preparing them for cooking is beneficial to her and indicates a balance in her life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person intending to eat Interpretation of a dream about potatoes for a married woman Interpretation of a dream about potatoes for a married woman If the potatoes are healthy and not defective, they are profit and money. Interpretation of seeing potatoes in a dream for a married woman and the potatoes are spoiled or rotten, then they are problems and disputes. The interpretation of a dream about potatoes for a married woman may indicate the end of her fears and problems. Seeing yourself cooking potatoes in a dream and eating potatoes for a married woman indicates a change in attitude for the better. Storing potatoes indicates that she is exposed to anxiety in the days Next. Buying rotten potatoes in a dream for a married woman is a sign that the dreamer will cause trouble. Seeing potatoes in a dream for a pregnant woman Seeing a pregnant woman eating potatoes means goodness, blessing and health for her and her fetus. Seeing potatoes on purpose and storing them indicates difficulties or fatigue during pregnancy. Interpretation of a dream about potatoes Seeing potatoes in a dream is an undesirable dream and can indicate problems and difficulties. Interpretation of a dream about intentional potatoes in a dream for a married woman is a sign of strife and marital problems. Interpretation of dreams about potatoes Many intentions

title: What is the interpretation of seeing clouds in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Clouds in a dream and the details of their interpretation. Seeing clouds in a dream is a good vision and good news for the dreamer. Clouds are a symbol of goodness, protection, and safety. As Sheikh Ibn Shirin said in the book Interpretation of Dreams, clouds portend the fulfillment of dreams and wishes. It indicates wisdom, knowledge, and other things symbolized by seeing clouds in a dream, as seeing clouds in a dream varies according to their color and how close or far they are to the dreamer, and we will talk about this topic in detail in our article. Dream of a Cloud: Sheikh Muhammad bin Shirin interpreted seeing clouds in a dream as a mercy from God (Glory be to Him) to the dreamer, and clouds indicate faith and the liberation of man from torment. Ibn Sirin says that clouds symbolize wisdom and knowledge, and that seeing clouds in a dream portends ships filled with grace. And sustenance and goodness for the dreamer. Clouds in the dream show soldiers working to protect people. This is because it falls in the form of rain and protects people from thirst. The appearance of a black cloud in a dream near the dreamer is evidence of his feeling of alienation and loneliness and his suffering from crises and problems in his life. Seeing a black cloud in a dream without rain means the sadness and anxiety that the dreamer suffers in his life. Confused about your affairs and no Do you find an explanation that reassures you? Search on Google for the Egyptian dream interpretation website. What is the interpretation of catching clouds in a dream? Dreaming of catching a black cloud means psychological disturbances, fears and problems that he suffers from in his life and he tries to find a solution to them by constantly thinking. But if the dreamer sees that he is carrying a cloud in the sky, then this vision is Good news for him about good nutrition and abundance and that he will achieve what he wants. Keeping a black cloud for an unmarried woman and making it rain indicates that she will get married soon or will relieve her of some distress. Interpretation of seeing clouds in a dream Clouds in a dream indicate a ruler with a strong hand, who is generally feared People and fear him. If a person sees in a dream that the clouds are moving towards him, but without lightning, thunder or wind, then this vision promises the dreamer the fulfillment of his dreams and desires. Seeing an unmarried young man riding on the clouds and being taken out by the clouds, and this vision shows the young man’s journey to a place far from his homeland and his family. As for riding in the clouds for a single person, it is good news that a person will marry a girl with good morals and religion - God willing. Interpretation of a dream about white clouds: Seeing white clouds in a dream and they were close to the dreamer in the dream. If white clouds appeared in the dream and were very far and high, then this vision indicates That the dreamer will obtain a lot of goodness and things that will make him happy during the next period of his life. A married woman who sees white clouds in her dream is good news for an imminent pregnancy, and a pregnant woman who sees white clouds portends an imminent due date - God willing -. If the dreamer sees in His dream of a white cloud takes beautiful shapes and different images that satisfy his mind, so this vision is good and conveys good news to the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing clouds If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is sleeping on the clouds on his back or sleeping in any way...

title: Interpretation of a dream about a key and a door for a divorced woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a key and a door for a divorced woman: If a divorced woman sees a key in her dream, and it is a very large key, and she is surprised by its shape in the dream and tries to find out who this key belongs to, then this also indicates an abundance of sustenance. As follows: If a divorced woman sees in her dream that her ex-husband gave her a key ring with many keys, this indicates the great goodness that she will obtain by God’s command. And if a divorced woman sees in her dream that someone gives her a key, this is evidence of the collapse of anxiety and she will soon be relieved. If a divorced woman sees a key in her dream, this means that she will get rid of difficulties and enjoy peace of mind soon. And if she sees a key in the hand of someone she does not really know, this indicates her unknown fate, but she will be happy later. See also: Giving a key in a dream to a married woman Other interpretations of a dream A divorced woman with a door and a key. A divorced vision of a key and a door indicates different interpretations. The vision varies according to the type of key and the thing opened with the key as follows: First: If the key is to a car. If a divorced woman sees a car key in her dream, this symbolizes that she will find a new home or a new job, as well as the following: The dream may also indicate that you will get married soon. Or you will become available. He has the opportunity to travel. The car key shows his ability to control and his wishes will come true. Second: If the key is to the door or to the apartment. If a divorced woman sees the key to the apartment in her dream, this means that her desires and demands in life will come true, as well as the following: She will triumph over her enemies and live happily ever after. Circumstances have changed for the better and better than the previous circumstances. It also indicates the end of divorce disputes and problems. Third: If the key is the key to Paradise. If a divorced woman dreams that she sees the key to Paradise, then this dream indicates the purity of her heart and her chastity. It also indicates: Choosing the right path, and staying away from... The path of deception and corruption. The dream also expresses reason, success in this world and goodness in the afterlife. The meaning of the final vision of the key and the door in her dream. The dream of a divorced woman with a key and a door in general indicates her character and goals in life, as well as the following: If the lady dreams of the key and in reality she wants to start A new life, the dream is a sign for her that we will start a new successful life and what she wants and wants will come true. If a divorced woman sees the key and the door in her dream and the key opens easily, this means that she has achieved the things she is looking for. And if she sees in her dream that she is opening an old door , but without the key, this indicates the possibility of reconciliation with her ex-husband and she can return to him. The old door in a divorced woman’s dream symbolizes the events that she was going through, and opening it means that her ex-husband will return again as soon as possible. Interpretation of a dream about a door key in general: seeing the key In a dream, it symbolizes annoying people who want to know everything about the dreamer. Seeing a key in a dream also indicates the following: victory over enemies and achieving the dreamer’s goals. And if the dreamer sees that he has...

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing dead people hungry in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing the dead hungry in detail. This proposal has been at the top of the research site in recent years because of the interpretations and evidence that this vision carries, especially since when the deceased visits one of us in a dream, we feel that there is an important message from him. We open the dream interpretation book to convey to you all the interpretations mentioned about this. The dream and what does the deceased want from the fortuneteller? Let us know more. Follow us. Read also: The toilet in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing dead people hungry, in details. Interpretation of a dream about seeing dead people hungry, in details. Ibn Sirin mentioned the interpretation of a dream about a dead person as being hungry and in need of food. There are different interpretations, the most important of which are: The biggest indication that interpretation scholars agree on is that the deceased must pay off debts. Eating the dead greedily in a dream is an undesirable sign for the fortuneteller, and indicates distress and misery. It was also said: Giving a dead person is better than receiving it, so if a dead person eats food in a dream, this is not good news. A dead person waiting for a meal in a dream is evidence of... His need for forgiveness and supplication. Read also: Pregnancy in a dream. Interpretation of a married woman seeing a dead man who is hungry. Ibn Sirin narrated that the meaning of a married woman’s dream was followed by many interpretations. Most of them ask for zakat on the dead and pray for mercy and forgiveness for him. The hunger of a dead man in a dream is a sign for her that one of her relatives He will leave this world soon, and God knows best. Seeing him eating food in a married woman’s house in a dream was interpreted as one of the problems that will take over the house. The meaning of eating food with a hungry dead person in a dream is also interpreted according to the reputation of that dead person. And if she has a reputation Good, this indicates her high status among people and the family. Read also: Penguin in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about dying of hunger for a pregnant woman. Below are the interpretations of a pregnant woman who sees a dead person in a dream while she is hungry: A pregnant woman who eats food with a deceased person in a dream is a new joy and new good news. It has been interpreted That her fetus will be healthy if she is happy in the dream. The dead woman ate food in her dream, and the food was delicious, and this is evidence of the dead person’s status in the Lord of the Worlds. It is said that if the deceased was a woman and he sat with her at the meal, this is evidence that she will enjoy a happy and dignified life. What Interpretation of seeing dead people starving in one dream? Let us get to know the interpretation of this dream for one girl in some of the following lines: If an unmarried girl dreams that her father is hungry and asks her for food, this indicates his need for charity and begging. And if this girl is suffering from many things In her life, this dream is considered unpleasant for her. Her financial circumstances may worsen, and God Almighty knows best. And if the girl’s father comes in her dream while he is hungry and sits with him, she will be happy. This indicates her longing for her father and her feeling of loneliness without him. Washing the dead. Signs of the hunger of the dead in a dream. Ibn Katheer narrated In the interpretation of a dream about a dead person who is hungry, it is that he often asks his family to pray and ask forgiveness for him. The happiness of the dead person in the presence of food is a sign of an imminent death, and God Almighty is Most High.

title: What is the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream of seeing a child’s bed in a dream?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of the dream of seeing a child’s bed in a dream by Ibn Sirin, where I saw in a dream that the child’s bed reflects problems in marriage and the desire to interact with a person full of passion and love, but breaking the bed is not okay, which caused me a lot of anxiety and real trouble, as the bed shows that the girl’s dreams lead To a lot of goodness and marriage, and seeing a bed in a dream indicates the fulfillment of dreams and desires and a happy marriage. For a young man and girl, follow us. Seeing a baby crib by Ibn SirinSeeing that buying a baby crib in a dream is a sign of blessing. Likewise, seeing a cradle in a dream is also a sign of positive change in the dreamer’s life. Seeing a cradle and not being able to take it in a dream is a sign of sadness and crying. In addition, single people who see a family in their dreams will guide him to a good wife in the future. Likewise, seeing a baby’s crib in a dream is also a symbol of psychological comfort. Seeing a baby’s cradle means good and happy news and is a sign of many good things in the dreamer’s life. Seeing a white child's cradle means a wonderful life to come, good news, and the death of sadness and anxiety. Sleeping on a bed with new, clean white bedding indicates the luxury of life, the dreamer's purity, reassurance, repentance from sins, and return to God. Seeing a small children's crib in a dream for an unmarried young man indicates the beginning of A new life, which may be marriage or entry into a new prestigious job. Seeing a child’s bed in a married man’s dream indicates the fulfillment of ambitions and dreams and his promotion at work. Perhaps it indicates that his wife is pregnant, and his white bed is happy news. Seeing a sick child sleeping in the bed indicates bad luck and many problems, just as a dirty bed indicates stress, pain, and diseases. A boy’s bed can indicate many problems and troubles. Looking at a cradle bed for an individual woman. A married woman who saw a bed in her dream heralds the coming of kindness, a welcome sight. It also suggests that I saw the cradle in a dream, because this is evidence of an imminent marriage. Accordingly, when you see a woman’s bed in your dream, you are optimistic and optimistic. A single man sees himself in a dream as if he is sitting On a swing in a dream, symbolizes psychological comfort and safety. If an unmarried woman sees that she is hypnotizing her child and that this child is beautiful, this indicates that this girl will achieve what she desires and will bear many responsibilities. Seeing sleeping in a clean and tidy bed indicates psychological and family stability. And the bed White denotes good character and a good reputation for a girl. Seeing a child’s bed for a married woman When a married woman sees in a dream a bed like a boy’s, the gospel is that she will give birth to a child. As for seeing a married woman dreaming of buying a bed, this is a sign of her goodness and rich food. It was good news for her husband that she saw Her husband buys a bed and gives it to him in a dream. If a married woman sees that she is sleeping on a child’s bed and this bed is clean, this indicates the stability of her married life and her happiness with her husband. It can also indicate a new pregnancy and it may be a boy. And seeing the purchase of a baby bed

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a gold store in a dream

preview.html: Seeing gold in general in a dream is a common and widespread vision in the dreams of many men and women, because this vision has multiple meanings, so dream interpretation scholars have been interested in clarifying many of the indications that this vision indicates. We will explain in detail the interpretation of seeing a gold store in a dream. Interpretation of seeing clothes in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of a gold store in a dream. The location of gold in a dream indicates that the dreamer has achieved many successes and multiple achievements in the current field of work. The location of gold also indicates a lot of money and food. The abundance that will appear before the dreamer in the near future without much effort. The position of gold in the man’s dream indicates that this man will take several important positions in his work in a short period of time. As for the position of gold that appeared in the young man’s dream, it indicates that he will find A job through which he receives a high salary, and it is also one of the most respected jobs. Interpretation of a dream about a legal spell in a dream. Seeing gold in a dream for a girl. Dream interpreters confirm that gold for an unmarried girl portends her approaching official engagement, especially since gold symbolizes the girl’s marriage. It indicates Gold in a girl’s dream also indicates the good reputation that the dreamer has. As for seeing the loss of gold in a dream, it indicates the loss of an important opportunity in this girl’s life that may not be replaced again. Gold in a girl’s dream indicates marriage to a wealthy and financially well-off man. Interpretation of a dream Seeing the call to prayer in a dream. Gold in a dream for a pregnant woman. Ibn Sirin believes that gold for a pregnant woman is a sign that this woman will give birth to a boy, God willing. Gold also indicates to a pregnant woman that the coming child will be a source of great happiness for the dreamer. As for if the pregnant woman is wearing a ring Short of gold, you may suffer from problems and difficulties during childbirth. Interpretation of a dream about a lizard in a dream for a single woman – a symbol of seeing a lizard in a dream. A gift of gold in a dreamIf the dreamer receives a gift of gold from an acquaintance, this indicates that the dreamer really has a benefit Great from this person. If the dreamer is going through sorrows, problems, and crises, then receiving a gift of gold from a familiar person indicates that this person stands by him to escape this sadness. A married woman receiving a gold gift from her husband in a dream indicates the imminent pregnancy of a male child. For the dreamer. As for the unmarried girl who receives a gift of gold from her lover, she will be linked to that man, and this may be good news of his sincere intention to marry her. Interpretation of a dream about tahini in a dream for a single woman - a symbol of seeing tahini in a dream. Seeing yourself wearing gold in a dream is believed. Ibn Sirin that a woman wearing gold in a dream indicates that this woman will assume a prestigious presidential position in her current job. As for a man wearing gold, it appears that this man has committed some sins and immorality, because a man is forbidden from wearing gold in reality. Wearing gold on a woman or Unmarried girl refers to the status of

title: Interpretation of seeing the number 50 in a dream, and what does the number 50 mean?

preview.html: Likewise, as humans, numbers mean a lot to us. Some of us like certain numbers and some of us are not optimistic about a certain number. Also, in dreams numbers do not go unnoticed. Each number has an interpretation and meaning. In this article we will take the example of the number 50 and its interpretation in a dream. Interpretation of the appearance of the number 50 in a dream As we mentioned, numbers do not go unnoticed in our ordinary lives. We all have our favorite numbers that we feel optimistic about and other numbers that we do not like to mention or use in our lives. Likewise, in dreams, Numbers do not pass through an ordinary passage, but each number has its meaning. The number 50 is very lucky in dreams, so anyone who sees the number 50 in a dream should be optimistic and expect a lot of good. The importance of seeing the number 50 in a dream The number 50 in a dream has received many interpretations, all Good. Anyone who saw a £50 banknote. This was a sign of increased livelihood, and it could also be a sign of victory and multiple gains. Seeing the number 50 in a dream could indicate Saladin immediately. If the dreamer is a single woman, then this It indicates that she will be engaged or married soon. Also, seeing the number 50 in a dream can be a sign of the dreamer’s long life and security. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the number 50 in a dream. Ibn Sirin gave several interpretations of seeing the number 50 in a dream: When the dreamer sees the number 50 in a dream, this is evidence To get rid of the envy and hatred that affect his life. A woman who sees the number 50 in her dream, this is a sign of a lot of nourishment and quality that will come to her in the near future. He also explained that the number 50 in a dream could be an indication of the dreamer recovering from any disease that affects On his life. He also explained that the number 50 is designated for the man who is going to marry or is planning. Matters related to these matters will be facilitated and you will find acceptance and facilitation from the bride’s family. If the dreamer is working on a project of his own and is at its beginning. Seeing the number fifty is a sign for him that this work will be facilitated. He has all the good things to complete them perfectly. See also: Interpretation of the number 50 in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of the number 50 in a dream. Al-Nabulsi disagrees that seeing the number 50 in a dream, especially in the form of money, is a sign of kindness and livelihood. But he added that if the dreamer sees that he has lost A banknote worth 50 pounds sterling. It is not a good dream, but it will have bad connotations that portend unpleasant news. Interpretation of dropping the number 50 in a dream with a married woman. The number 50 in a dream brings good news to a married woman and always kindness, and this is according to the interpretation of most interpreters of this vision. If a married woman sees that she She was giving her husband a 50-pound banknote, so this is the dream. Evidence of food and kindness coming to her, as well as an indication of a stable and peaceful life with her husband. When a married woman dreams, she is giving her son a 50-pound banknote. This is a sign and evidence of This is the best of her son, and the kindness of his upbringing and condition, and that he is a good person

title: Interpretation of seeing my mother-in-law in a dream

preview.html: Seeing my mother-in-law in a dream mostly symbolizes medical relationships or protection in some cases, and the interpretation of seeing my mother-in-law in a dream varies depending on her condition, whether she is arguing, smiling, sick, or dead. Everything we will learn about its interpretation in detail in the following lines. Interpretation of seeing my mother-in-law in Dream: Seeing a mother-in-law in a dream symbolizes strengthening relationships with her and may indicate protection as a reference to the word “mother-in-law.” If a married woman sees her mother-in-law in a dream, this indicates her mother-in-law’s approval of her. Seeing her mother-in-law pregnant shows the many responsibilities she bears, and her mother-in-law giving birth in a dream shows the end of fatigue. If she hears her mother-in-law praising her, she will be famous. But if she sees her mother-in-law asking her husband to marry her, This indicates that her husband will enter a new job that will bring him a lot of food. If her mother-in-law sees that her husband is marrying one of his relatives, the vision indicates that she was trying to keep her husband away from her. If her mother-in-law wants to divorce her, this indicates that she has moved to another house. If She saw her mother-in-law sleeping in her bed, this indicates that she is spying on her life and secrets, and the vision may symbolize the dissolution of her relationship with her husband. And if the dreamer sees that her mother-in-law is calling her, this means that she heard news about her after interrupting her. If the dreamer is the person who communicates with her mother-in-law, The vision symbolizes friendship and communication between them. As for not responding to the call of the husband’s mother in a dream, this indicates discord and problems between them. Seeing the husband’s mother giving money to the pioneer indicates a lot of sustenance and kindness, but if the dreamer is the one who gives money to her mother-in-law, The vision symbolizes justice and benevolence. Seeing the husband’s mother visiting her son’s house indicates love between them, while the dreamer’s mother-in-law expelling her indicates that she is being subjected to injustice in her husband’s house. You may also be interested in: Interpretation of a dream about divorce in a dream for a married woman and a single woman Interpretation of dreams for my mother-in-law who gives me food If The dreamer saw her husband's mother offering her fresh food, this indicates the fulfillment of her desire. The dream indicates calming her circumstances. But if her mother-in-law gives her food and she throws it away, this indicates denial of blessings, and seeing her mother-in-law refusing to eat is a sign of losing money. If the dreamer sees her mother-in-law offering her delicious food, this indicates that her mother-in-law is satisfied with her, but if the food burns The vision indicates that her mother-in-law sparked a quarrel between her. And her husband. If the food spoils, the vision symbolizes the spoilage of life between her and her husband because of her mother-in-law. If the dreamer sees her mother-in-law offering her sour food, this means that she heard hurtful and hurtful words from her, but if her mother-in-law gives her bitter food, this indicates the bitterness of life. Dreaming of a mother-in-law eating sweet food is a sign of her mother-in-law praising her, but if the dreamer gives food to her mother-in-law, then the vision shows her fairness to her mother. - Father-in-law, and refusing to provide food to her mother-in-law symbolizes withholding money from relatives. Interpretation of seeing my mother-in-law in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried woman dreams that she got married and sees her mother-in-law

title: Interpretation of a dream about black and white pigeons and pigeon eggs in a dream

preview.html: DoveInterpretation of a dream about a dove for a married womanInterpretation of a dream about a white doveInterpretation of a dream about a bird DoveInterpretation of a dream about a dove for a single womanInterpretation of a dream about colored pigeonsInterpretation of seeing a dove in a dream for a pregnant womanInterpretation of a dream about a white dove for a married womanSeeing a dove in general means that the dream is a sign of goodness and optimism, because a dove in a dream is evidence of credibility in conveying news And the messenger who delivers trust and the message with care and precision. Black and white doves are both signs of chaste women who protect their husbands in the unseen. The white dove lying on the eggs shows a beautiful woman of Arab origin. Seeing dove eggs in a dream is a sign of females or girls. Whoever saw in a dream and dreamed that the dove that was He keeps it in the house. She ran away from home, so the dream indicates the divorce or death of the wife. Seeing the slaughter of white or black pigeons in a dream is a sign of marrying a virgin woman. Seeing a white or black dove is a sign of God’s response to one’s hope and desire. Whoever dreams that he is catching pigeons in a dream Or a dream, this means that the dreamer will collect money from the nobles of society, but if he eats pigeon meat in a dream, this also indicates money. Seeing pigeon eggs or pigeons laying eggs or eating white pigeon eggs and black pigeons in a dream, and the dream is a sign for girls, women and boys and also shows wealth. Seeing the eye of a dove in a dream and meditating on the eyes of a pigeon and finding a problem in the eye or eyes of the pigeon is a sign of weakness in the wife’s religion. Whoever sees in a dream and dreams that a white dove attacked him or rushed to him in a dream or that it descended to him from the sky, then the dream shows the goodness that was promised. The dreamer sees a black dove crying or making sad sounds near his ear or next to his head, and the dreamer is sick, so the dream indicates the approach of death. Whoever sees in a dream a white dove or a dove hanging on his neck, this is evidence of what happened between him and God. Among the interpretations of this dream is that it indicates relief from worries, imprisonment, or crises in life. If he sees in a dream and dreams that a white dove or a white dove is trapped, freed, and flying. Interpretation of a dove in a dream - YouTube
